description: Comprehensive driver for setting up, configuring, and operating AutoGPT systems within Project Eden.

installation.description: Instructions for installing AutoGPT and its dependencies.
steps: Download AutoGPT from the official GitHub repository.
Extract the files to a designated directory within the Project Eden file structure.
Install required dependencies through provided scripts or manually using package managers.

plugin_management.description: Guidelines for installing and managing AutoGPT plugins.
steps: Download plugins from the AutoGPT plugins directory or external sources.
Execute dependency installation scripts for each plugin.
Configure ALLOWLISTED_PLUGINS in the .env file to enable specific plugins.

integration_with_leon_ai.description: Steps to integrate AutoGPT with Leon.ai for enhanced capabilities.
steps: Create a 'Auto-GPT' folder within Leon.ai's working directory.
Copy AutoGPT files into this directory.
Use Visual Studio Plus to open and manage the AutoGPT project within Leon.ai's environment.

primary_autoGPT.description: Configuration and operation of the Primary AutoGPT agent, serving as a controller and communicator.
tasks: Interpret tasks from user or higher-level systems.
Delegate tasks to Secondary AutoGPT agents.
Analyze and relay outputs from Secondary agents.
primary_autoGPT.communication: Primary agent communicates with Secondary agents through terminal commands and output analysis.

secondary_autoGPT.description: Configuration and operation of Secondary AutoGPT agents, responsible for executing tasks.
tasks: Perform tasks as instructed by the Primary AutoGPT.
Interact with online and local applications as required.
Provide feedback and results to the Primary AutoGPT.
secondary_autoGPT.communication: Secondary agents receive instructions from the Primary AutoGPT and report back through terminal output or designated communication channels.

safety_protocols.monitoring: Continuous monitoring of AutoGPT activities, especially in continuous mode, to prevent unauthorized actions.
safety_protocols.command_verification: Verification of commands before execution to ensure they align with Project Eden's safety and operational guidelines.
safety_protocols.error_handling: Implementation of robust error handling mechanisms to address and rectify issues promptly.

best_practices: Regularly update AutoGPT and its plugins to the latest versions.
Maintain clear documentation of all configurations and customizations.
Back up critical data and configurations periodically to prevent data loss.

solutions: Review and follow plugin installation instructions carefully.
Ensure the OPENAI_API_KEY is correctly set in the .env file.
Check the integration steps with Leon.ai and ensure the AutoGPT directory is correctly set up.
